entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm over southern sections. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
